Body:
{"id":"chatcmpl-671","object":"chat.completion","created":1767598456,"model":"gpt-oss:120b-cloud","system_fingerprint":"fp_ollama","choices":[{"index":0,"message":{"role":"assistant","content":"{"update":true,"description":"Знайка совершил межпланетное путешествие на Луну, участвовал в строительстве космической ракеты и, отвергнув вулканическую и метеоритную теории кратеров, выдвинул гипотезу о лунной поверхности как блине с дырками; он также предположил, что метеориты, падающие под наклоном, оставляют вытянутые или овальные кратеры, что раздражает вулканистов и метеоритчиков, называющих его блинистом."}","reasoning":"We need to decide if candidate adds new factual information beyond current description. Current description already covers many things: Znaika (Знайка) did interplanetary trip to Moon, built rocket, observed gravity changes, rejected volcanic and meteorite crater theories, hypothesized comparing lunar surface to pancake with holes, wrote a book about lunar surface being once molten lava etc., explained volcano as mountain with small crater.

Candidate adds: Znaika discusses how meteoroids falling at an angle would leave elongated/oval traces on Moon, unlike round craters observed. His ideas annoy volcanologists and meteoriticists, who call him "блинистом". This seems new: the discussion about angled meteorite impacts leaving elongated craters is not mentioned before. Also the fact that his ideas irritate volcanists and meteoriticists, who call him "блинистом". The candidate also repeats alias "блинистом". The gender is unknown but current gender is male. That is potentially a conflict: candidate says gender unknown, but we shouldn't change gender unless new facts? The task only to update description, not other fields. So if new facts present, we return update true and a new description combining existing facts and new ones.

We must ensure description 1-3 sentences, coherent, same language (Russian). Use only facts supported by current + candidate. We need to integrate new fact about angled impacts causing elongated craters and that his ideas irritate specialists, who call him "блинистом". Also maintain existing facts? It wants to integrate existing facts with new ones, not drop relevant details. But description length must be 1-3 sentences, so we must condense. So maybe a summary: "Знайка совершил межпланетное путешествие на Луну, участвовал в строительстве ракеты и, отвергнув вулканическую и метеоритную теории кратеров, выдвинул гипотезу о лунной поверхности как блине с дырками; он также предположил, что метеориты, падающие под наклоном, оставляют вытянутые кратеры, что раздражает вулканистов и метеоритчиков, называющих его блинистом." That's one sentence? That's long but okay. Could split into two sentences. Ensure no invented facts. Use "метеоритчиков" perhaps okay.

So we output {"update": true, "description": "..."}"},"finish_reason":"stop"}],"usage":{"prompt_tokens":563,"completion_tokens":637,"total_tokens":1200}}
